DOC.brief_summary: This study assess short long term outcome individual undergo minimally invasive surgery gastro-esophageal junction ( MISGEJ ) . Patients respond questionnaire annual basis evaluate quality life functionality follow MISGEJ . Hospital chart also review annual basis assess patient health outcome .
DOC.criteria: All patient Ottawa Hospital undergo minimally invasive surgery GEJ Less 18 year age .
DOC.keyword: All minimally invasive surgery gastro-esophageal junction
